name: sweater style wristwarmer
description:
This is a new design--I finished the edge near the fingers with a sweater type rib-knit, and made it extra long so that you can roll it up over your chilly hands on those cold days. 

Versatility meets fashion! Boom!

From the top to the bottom edge the measurement is 10.5" (26 cm) and they fit around a 3.5" wide palm (9cm). There is a thumb gusset, and they will fit either hand. (This yarn is also quite stretchy.) Knitted in a smoke free home.

The yarn I knitted them in is 20% lamb's wool and 80% acrylic, so they can be washed in water up to about 104 degrees F. (40 c) and tumbled dry. Easy peasy!

name: wool cabled neck warmer
description:
This neckwarmer is a skinny version of the thick cabled neckwarmer. Knit in a thinner yarn, but just as warm and soft, it is the perfect solution when chunky is just too much. The warmer fastens with a unique wood-grain button.

Knit in an acrylic/wool blend, this yarn is extremely soft and easy to care for. The warmer measures 18" (46 cm) long and 2.5" (6 cm) wide.


Knitted, by me, in a smoke free home, as always.
Wash in warm water and lay flat to dry.

name: big pom hat
description:
This hat makes a statement, while keeping you nice and warm! 

Knit in a creamy white color, and topped with a 4.5" pom on top.

The yarn is a chunky wool/acrylic blend and will fit a head with a circ. of approx. 21". (It will stretch)

Hand knit by me, in a smoke free home. Hand wash, dry flat.

name: grape and avocado wristwarmers
description:
I love this yarn, and these wristwarmers are super warm and in fun colors of green and purple they will cheer you up on a dreary winter day. They are also great in a cold office--you can still type with them on!

From the top to the bottom edge the measurement is 9" (23 cm) and they fit around a 3.5" wide palm (9cm). There is a thumb gusset, and they will fit either hand. (This yarn is also quite stretchy.)Knitted in a smoke free home.

The yarn I knitted them in is 20% lamb's wool and 80% acrylic, so they can be washed in water up to about 104 degrees F. (40 c) and tumbled dry. Easy peasy!

name: big chunky cowl
description:
This is ready for you today and so so cozy warm. Throw it over a sweater or under your jacket and it adds a look of fashion with the added benefit of warmth! 

Knit in a wool-acrylic combination it is stretchy enough to pull down over your shoulders as a shawl if you'd like, as well.

Measures 9" from top to bottom. The yarn I used is 20% lamb's wool and 80% acrylic, so this can be washed in water up to about 104 degrees F. (40 c) and tumbled dry. Easy peasy!

Smoke free home....of course!
